channel.title: Definitely Need Some Help With MoparScape 3.0
channel.description:
*NOTE* On the pics, for some reason they're really small, but if you save em, you can open it in Windows Picture Viewer, makes it A LOT bigger. :D
Hey people, im new here, heard about moparscape from a friend, so thought id try it out. ;)
problem is, everytime i try to run "runMoparScape" (the ms-dos batch file), it gives me this screen:
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v408/snowfox10/mparagh.jpg[/img]
heres a link since the pic is small: http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v408/snowfox10/mparagh.jpg
any ideas? ive tried using MoparScapePriv21, more errors than trying to use 3.0
~SOLVED, THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO HELPED WITH THE CLIENT ERROR, YET I STILL HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE CACHE, TALKED ABOUT BELOW~
Thanks :D ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
ok, as i said, im gonna update this, so i did. i got the new java, and got moparscape 3.0 to work, right now its downloading the cache, then im gonna try and find my way through connecting to a certain server ;)
thanks for the move kbm, kinda thought it should be here :D
!!!!!UPDATE!!!!!!!!!
right now im having a problem with the cache, it doesnt want to be opened:
[URL=http://img242.imageshack.us/my.php?image=connerrortp3.png][IMG]http://img242.imageshack.us/img242/2079/connerrortp3.th.png[/img][/URL] ~Click On Image To Enlarge~
its having a problem unzipping the cache after it is downloaded, which i think is why its not able to connect to the servers
what happens is that when i try to connect to "runeq.no-ip.org" it says "Connection Error", and also, at the bottom, where theres a log of stuff thats goin on, it says:
[07:03:00] Downloading file... [07:46:25] File downloaded... [07:46:27] deleted c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/cache.zip [07:56:10] Set world to: runeq.no-ip.org
so because it cant unzip the cache file that is automatically downloaded, it deletes it
anyways, i need help on finding out how to get the zip file to be unzipped properly, which i think would solve the whole "Connection Error" thing. thanks ;)

item.title: Definitely Need Some Help With MoparScape 3.0
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

k, the second screenshot (the one that i actually need help on ;)) is up with imageshack, so clicking on it enlarges a lot, actually readable now :D[br][size=1]Posted at: July 20, 2006, 11:22:24 AM[/size][hr]any ideas, mopar?

Read full topic

item.title: Definitely Need Some Help With MoparScape 3.0
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Sepranem:

it just says “Connection Error - Retrying in ##”…but i think that’s because of the problem with the cache, and yeah i’m still having the problem with the cache not wanting to be opened = \

post bigger pictures that are readable of the error with opening the zip file please

hmm if your getting error connecting to server then that server is down,or are you stil having problems with the cache?

updated java, now i got the client to work, but im having problems connecting[br][size=1]Posted at: July 19, 2006, 12:02:46 PM[/size][hr]agh, im gonna be heading off soon, so leave me a post and ill check as soon as i can, thanks

EDIT:

im back, and still need help with getting the zip to work =S

that happened to me

just try dowloading it again, and check on your version of java to make sure its updated
